http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/faq/main.html#about_12

The default maximum PermGen space set by your JRE may be too small. You can increase the maximum PermGen size by launching WTP with VM argument: -XX:MaxPermSize=128M

(eclipse -vmargs -XX:MaxPermSize=128M)
Closing another report of a well known bug with a well documented work around.
